title: Glen Echo Park: Basic Information
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Basic Information             Basic Information           Physical Address           7300 MacArthur Boulevard  Glen Echo, MD 20812                 Directions         By Car: Capital Beltway (I-495), Maryland outer loop exit 40 Cabin John Parkway to Clara Barton Parkway; Virginia inner loop exit 41 Clara Barton Parkway East; follow Clara Barton Parkway to MacArthur Boulevard and Glen Echo exit, left onto MacArthur Boulevard, straight across traffic circle at Goldsboro Road, next left onto Oxford Road, end of street, parking lots on the left. By Metro: Red Line to Bethesda or Friendship Heights Station, transfer to Montgomery County Ride-On Bus # 29, Glen Echo stop.  Directions Details           Operating Hours & Seasons         Glen Echo Park Grounds and Parking Lot The grounds of Glen Echo Park are open daily from 6 a.m. to 1 a.m. (the next day).  No overnight parking.    Standard Hours    Sunday: 6:00 AM - 1:00 AM   Monday: 6:00 AM - 1:00 AM   Tuesday: 6:00 AM - 1:00 AM   Wednesday: 6:00 AM - 1:00 AM   Thursday: 6:00 AM - 1:00 AM   Friday: 6:00 AM - 1:00 AM   Saturday: 6:00 AM - 1:00 AM             Weather           Weather for Washington, D.C. and Bethesda, Maryland areas.         Fees & Passes     Entrance Fees:   Glen Echo Park Entrance fee - $0.00 No entrance, no parking fee for the grounds, some activities, classes, dances, shows, Carousel rides will have fees for those activities or events.   Entrance Passes:   no entrance pass, no entrance fee - $0.00 no entrance pass, no entrance fee         Visitor Centers              Â    Parking Information Picnic Information The Glen Echo Park Partnership for Arts and Culture Inc. manage the Glen Echo Park classes, dances and rentals for private functions. Schedules for the classes, dances, shows, and special events as well as information about renting facilities for private functions is available from their website. http://www.glenechopark.org/
